reviews.title: Processor NOT dimensity 6080
reviews.content: I expected a dimensity 6080 not a Snapdragon 685. Disappointed to find the Snapdragon 685 instead of the expected Dimensity 6080. The Snapdragon 685 falls short in performance, struggling with multitasking and intensive apps, and it lacks the power efficiency of the Dimensity 6080.
reviews.author: Ian
